Quick tips

Toolbar

It’s at the bottom of your screen, with stickies, stamps, and anything you need.


Move and Zoom

Holding Spacebar, use the hand tool to pan around. Zoom controls are in the top right corner.



Work with your team

FigJam’s better with others. Click the Share button above to invite your team.


Share
Wireframe tools

Stickies

Press “S” to quickly add a sticky to the canvas.


Rectangles

Press “R” to quickly place a rectangle onto the canvas. Other shapes can be selected from the toolbar or swapped from the shape menu.
